name: Relationship
desc: A to-one or to-many relationship from one resource object to others.

items.name: href
items.desc: A URL subpath that fetches the relationship resources as the primary object. This member is only present in responses.

items.name: next
items.desc: Link to the next page of resources in the relationship. Contains the offset query parameter that specifies the next page. See Fetch Resources by Page.

items.name: meta
items.desc: Contextual information about the relationship for the request or response.
